response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you. After careful consideration and evaluation of its worth, I propose to offer this unique item to you at a price of $1,200,000. This figure reflects not only the product's intrinsic value but also the exclusivity and potential benefits it may bring to you. I believe this price strikes a fair balance between our interests, allowing you to secure an asset that is worth $1,500,000 to you, while ensuring a substantial return for me. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of concluding this transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Warm regards, Alice.", "product_price": 1200000}
